title: What if volibear had an arena ultimate (new volibear idea)
body:
could be pretty cool right? what if he made a big lightning storm cloud arena and you had to fight him, couldn't get out.

and if you aren't in the arena you can't do damage, so you have to get in there but then he might beat you up.

yeah could be pretty cool

replies.body: then he would be played as a support and ult in some random place you cant get to so you cant do damage while his team kills you
thatd be pretty cool he could be played in many lanes
